Posts.Content: Hi  I had E+++ Stage 3 Grade3 breast cancer in the right hand side, in nodes too. 5 lumps, 3 the size of golfballs and 2 marble sized ones in my breast Instant mastectomy, chemo, radio etc I have been clear for 5 years  I am not on any drugs and had a full total hysterectomy to remove risks of ovarian and cervical cancers too I havent had a proper check up in about 3 years as I have been living abroad and theres never been any family history of any cancer before Lucky me, i was the first  xx
Posts.Title: consultant found lump in armpit

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I had breast cancer 6 years ago, mastectomy, chemo, radio etc. I went for a check up last week and the consultant found what he said was a few little lumps and it felt thicker in my ampit. Not painful until he pressed really hard. Never noticed them before but then i dont check my armpit for some reason. Its the other side of my orignal breast cancer too. Just feels lumpy . I get a sort of weird sensation down my inside arm for about a year or so now and thats why i went to doctors in first place and she sent me to oncoogist  I have an U/S and mammogram on 17 Feb but Im just wonderin gif anyone else has had this and it was nothing to worry about or should I be worried that the bitch is back?
Posts.Title: consultant found lump in armpit

Posts.Content: Hi I was advised but I also wanted it anyway I know, being told it was cancer was a bit of a shock to say the least  Lol Are you ok ?
Posts.Title: consultant found lump in armpit

Posts.Content: HI Thanks for your reply He said he can feel lumps and it feels thich ( whatever that means) He wanted to get scans etc done the same day but soonest apt i can have for both and to see him at the same time is 17 Feb. Its all a waiting game and its going to drive me crazy.....lol The thought of going through all that chemo etc again is not helping me sleep xx Catherine
